downloadTitle: Microsoft Lync Online Web App Training
downloadDescription: Learn how to use Microsoft Lync Online Web App to join meetings, when you don’t have Lync installed.

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Lync Online Web App Training.pptx

detailsSection:
This training course covers the following Microsoft Lync Online Web App topics:
  • Lync Online Web App Overview
  • Join Online meeting experience
  • Connect to meeting audio
  • Manage your meeting
  • Share your desktop or an application
  • Insert a Whiteboard or Poll page
  • Use the file transfer feature
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft Lync Online Web App Training.pptx
installInstructionSection: To install this download, save the file to a directory on your computer. After you save the file, open the presentation as you typically would. To remove this download, delete the file from the directory where you saved it.
